message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You can have 40% of the money, but I'll keep the rest. It's a generous offer!
I'll give you a bit less, but still a decent share. Your turn to decide!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy! Take it or leave it!
Let's meet in the middle, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but still keep a decent share for myself.
You're getting close to the bottom of the barrel, Alice. Take it or leave it!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of. This is my last offer.
You're really running out of options, Alice. This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
I'll give you the majority, but I'm not going down without a fight. This is my final offer.
You're really scraping the bottom of the barrel now, Alice. This is my last offer, take it or leave it!
I give up. You win. Take it all.
